Also for the first time, Microsoft says it is making the cloud-based edition of the software available before the on-premise, server-based version, which will come out in late February. That really reflects the push Microsoft is making into the cloud, Steve Ballmer said during an online launch event on Thursday. Microsoft's not the only one gunning for the cloud.
